title: LISA to Perform at Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show 2024! | 2024 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, Lisa, Music, Victoria's Secret, victorias secret fashion show | Just Jared: Celebrity News and Gossip | Entertainment
text: LISA to Perform at Victoria's Secret Fashion Show 2024! [LISA](https://www.justjared.com/tags/lisa/) is the next huge name to rock the upcoming [Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show](https://www.justjared.com/tags/victorias-secret/) runway. The 27-year-old [BLACKPINK](https://www.justjared.com/tags/blackpink/) member and solo superstar is set to take the stage and perform at return of the fashion show, taking place on October 15 in Brooklyn, marking its grand return after a six-year hiatus. “The Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show is such an iconic night in fashion and I’m so excited to be part of its return with so many incredible and powerful women being part of the show! It’s going to be a great night,” LISA said in a release, via [Billboard](https://www.billboard.com/music/pop/lisa-perform-victorias-secret-fashion-show-1235779271/). Keep reading to find out more… The news comes after the announcements that [Tyla](https://www.justjared.com/tags/tyla/) will also perform and [Cher](https://www.justjared.com/tags/cher/) will headline the show, making it an all-women artist lineup for the first time ever. LISA was also one of the best dressed at the 2024 MTV VMAs – [see who made the list!](https://www.justjared.com/2024/09/12/best-dressed-at-mtv-vmas-2024-12-best-red-carpet-fashion-stars-revealed/) [2024 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/2024-victorias-secret-fashion-show/), [Lisa](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/lisa/), [Music](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/music/), [Victoria's Secret](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/victorias-secret/), [victorias secret fashion show](https://dev.justjared.com/tags/victorias-secret-fashion-show/)
